div.p: Occurrence frequency (%) of three Madden–Julian Oscillation (MJO) event types from July to September during eight El Niño developing years in the period 1979–2016. Red bars represent the occurrence frequency (%) of non-MJO, blue for active MJO, and yellow for inactive MJO. An El Niño developing year is defined when the above-moderate El Niño events (including moderate events) develops from weak to strong
